name: clawdia
description: A local-first AI workspace for browser, code, and task automation.
author: Daniel Parker

scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:renderer" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:electron: wait-on http://localhost:5173 && wait-on dist/main/main.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --delay 2 --signal SIGTERM --watch dist/main --exec "electron . --no-sandbox"
scripts.dev:searchv2: concurrently -k "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:main:searchv2" "npm run dev:renderer" "npm run dev:electron:searchv2"
scripts.dev:electron:searchv2: wait-on http://localhost:5173 dist/main/main.js dist/search_v2/main/main.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development SEARCH_PIPELINE=v2 nodemon --watch dist/search_v2/main --exec "electron dist/search_v2/main/main.js --no-sandbox"
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer
